title: Why Won't My League of Legends Log In?
body:
So, I'm having this issue where my LoL will not launch and it won't allow me to play. For example:

I re downloaded my League of Legends and since I had to launch the new Launcher from April of this year, and after it downloaded it had the Launch button. I clicked "Launch" and it completely disappeared... which made me want to try again(I did like 3 times). And now I cannot play League of Legends. Please help me.

replies.body: It sounds like when you re-downloaded the client, your OS may not have kept all of it's permission settings for the client. Let's try setting up those [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) again really quick, but let me know if that still doesn't help!

Then check out that handy [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) I linked you earlier! If you aren't able to work through those steps on your own, feel free to reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
I'm having the same kind of issue. A lot of people are. Seems riot doesn't care or hasnt made an effort quite yet. Hoping they do because I really wanna play URF.
Ok, go into your League Of Legends folder (like C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/) and start lol.launcher.admin.exe - it worked for me.
